name: koha-plugin-transport-browser
description: A Koha plugin tool that provides a simple FTP/SFTP directory browser using the Koha::File::Transport infrastructure

scripts.release:patch: node increment_version.js patch | cat && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump version' && VERSION=$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && git tag -a v$VERSION -m "Release v$VERSION" && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: node increment_version.js minor | cat && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump version' && VERSION=$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && git tag -a v$VERSION -m "Release v$VERSION" && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: node increment_version.js major | cat && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump version' && VERSION=$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && git tag -a v$VERSION -m "Release v$VERSION" && git push origin main --follow-tags

author: Open Fifth
